author: Valerie Brock
text: Why has my #LongCovid symptom returned after a 5 month hiatus? Suddenly smelling smoke again, all day. #COVID19 #CovidIsNotOver #Covid_19

author: Valerie Brock
text: 👏🏻 Huge thanks to @mamaschwa for organizing our monthly meeting at @nanotronics in the #Brooklyn Navy Yard! Learn all about their incredible work ➡️ https://t.co/r8LchcUrJC https://t.co/kAt3CXeDq3

author: Valerie Brock
text: #STEMeducation is NOT Computer Science education! Computer science is actually a blend of all the STEM subjects. #Edtech is not Computer Science education! Stop labeling it incorrectly! #edutwitter #education #AcademicChatter #Teachers https://t.co/nX8t63qqLu

author: Valerie Brock
text: How is a tweet apologizing about micro aggressions, also in itself a micro aggression? Wow. Just wow. 🤔 😶 https://t.co/Ccz16ltdqH

author: Valerie Brock
text: 🎉 session 2 for our new cohort of #CSforAllNYC @NYCSchools educators! Going from block based to text based coding in @PlayCraftLearn! Led by @nicfinelli 🔥 @susietinker5 @laylah @i2eEDU https://t.co/KhQD3mBsMe

author: Valerie Brock
text: Best comments from today: “I made it rain llamas by accident.” “I’m stuck in a sewer.” “I can’t stop mining grass.” 😂  “I got a pig stuck in my maze.” 😂

author: Valerie Brock
text: Going back and forth between sessions as 50+ @NYCSchools educators have fun learning how to use @PlayCraftLearn & @MSMakeCode to teach #CSed! I don't know who is more excited for the students--me or their teachers! We've got all 5 boroughs in here! @susietinker5 @nicfinelli https://t.co/Cm9LML6dac

author: Valerie Brock
text: Very excited for another cohort of #CSforAllNYC educators to learn about @PlayCraftLearn’s  #computerscience curriculum and @MSMakeCode! 🎉 https://t.co/LAEYPSPK9D

author: Valerie Brock
text: We are so lucky to have you on our team 🦾🦾🦾 @courtney_ryanne! https://t.co/RsOVSNbhCL

author: Valerie Brock
text: 🦾Thank you to Marley Zeno and team @brainpop for sharing Creative Coding with some of our rock-star #CSforAllNYC @NYCSchools educators on this stormy Saturday. DId you know that Brainpop allows you to integrate coding into ANY topic? 🤯https://t.co/r90n19iOnl https://t.co/4LU6HoP4tA
